title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 16.4 - Exemption of certain radiation sources from the requirements of this part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 16.4 - Exemption of certain radiation sources from the requirements of this part

State Regulations

Any person is hereby exempted from the requirements of this Part to the extent that such person transfers, receives, possesses, installs, operates or uses any of the radioactive materials, radiation equipment or items containing radioactive material listed in Appendix 16-A, Table 1, infra. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
16.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
